metadata.title: USN-4803-1 -- Gifsicle vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Gifsicle did not properly handle certain input. If a user were tricked into opening a malicious GIF, an attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4803-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gifsicle - 1.88-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
